Translations.Text: A ppesganiv tin i k ihwan segsent. A d tawiv $uoek tin i k ihwan, ne$ tin teb$iv si tid taazlev. Ur fellak tuzzma. Akka i iwulem, iwakken ad qenaant, ur $webbnent, ad oavint akw, ayen i sent tefkiv. Oebbi Ieoa i illan deg ulawen nnwen. Oebbi Izga d Amusnaw, Ieellem
Ur ak eellent tlawin, sya d asawen, ne$ abeddel n tlawin, xas taaoeb ik uuifa nnsent, siwa tiklatin ik. Oebbi Izga Issikid yal cci

A wid iumnen! Ur keccmet ar texxamin n Nnbi, ar awen iaammed, d inebgawen ar wucci, ur teggunim. Maca, ma tepwaaovem, kecmet. Mi teccam, sahlet; ur ssioxiset ameslay. Ayagi, s tidep, iqelleq Nnbi. Isetea segwen. Oebbi ur Ipsetei $ef tidep. Ma tessutrem asent ta$awsa, ssutret ep deffir tsabert. Yif it wakka, i tezdeg n wulawen nnwen, akked wulawen nnsent. Ur awen ilaq ara a pjjerim Amazan n Oebbi, ne$ a ppa$em tilawin is, deffir es, d awez$i. Ayagi, ad yili, ar Oebbi, d lefviea
Ama tessknem d leaoa, ne$ teffrem p, Oebbi, s tidep, Ieoa yal cci

Ur telli tiyta degsent af ibabaten nnsent, arraw nnsent, atmaten nnsent, arraw n wamaten nnsent, arraw n tsetmatin nnsent, tilawin nnsent, ticrikin nnsent. Ad eezzbent i Oebbi. Oebbi, s tidep, d Anagi n yal cci
Oebbi akked lmalayek iS, s tidep, Nuban $ef Nnbi. A wid iumnen! Nubet fellas, ternum as azul aemayan
Ih, wid ijjerin Oebbi akked Umazan iS, Ixza ten Oebbi, di ddunit, di laxeot. Ihegga yasen d aaaqeb isdullun
Wid ijjerin lmumnin, argaz tameiiut, $ef wayen ur ksiben, ni$ bbwin acehrir akked ubekkav n uuee
A Nnbi! Ini i tlawin ik, i iss ik, i tlawin n lmumnin, ad jemaant ijufao nnsent. Ppif akka, a tent aaqlen, ur tent pooerin. Oebbi Izga Ipsemmie, Ipeunu
